channel.title: Artificial Reality - Requesting devlopment team
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/24v5qbl.png[/img][/center] [center][b] Welcome, thanks for viewing my thread. Before I explain i'd like to lay out a few things.[/b][/center]
The base: Project Insanity
[b]Requirements to join this development team![/b] Knowledge of Java Maturity Can take constructive criticism!
[b]What AR is about; [/b] [b]I've always wanted to develop a server in which players will want to play. I've seen so many.. dull servers, so many remakes, so many spawn servers. What I'm wanting to produce out of this project is a unique server that people will want to play. I've noticed the popularity of modern day RS type of servers. So this is no remake of a specific time in Runescape, nor is it supposed to be made 'like' Runescape. This server will need it's on unique features, something players will enjoy, while having a good economy aswell. No one wants to play a server in which 99.9% of the players are rich. I'm looking for a team that's willing to stick together! Not one that falls apart within 2 days, you must know what you're doing! Feel free to ask questions if you're stumped though. Just don't come in and ask how to add commands.[/b]
[b] Server features;[/b] [b]Summoning, with full BoB storage. Correct amount stored depending on familiar. All skills trainable, although I would like to rewrite a few of them. Great combat, it's been tweaked a bit to fix accuracy. Barrows Ofc GWD Ofc 100% duel arena, what I mean by 100% as in no bugs, no dupes, no glitching that I'm aware of. I've spent some time trying to get rid of all the bugs in this mini-game. I've tested it with a few friends, seems to work fine. Working Run/prayer/Hp orbs Divine SS effect[/b]
Application format;
[code] Knowledge of Java language, based on a scale 1-10: 10 being most experienced Maturity level 1-10 Can you take constructive criticism? Estimation of how many hours daily you can work? You will not drop out of the project unless you honestly think it's going no where. Msn: Skype: [/code] [color=blue][b] [b] Some pictures, more coming soon[/b]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14a9g7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14dovpt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/n5sw0l.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/qpp8cm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/vo0vp5.jpg[/img]

item.title: Artificial Reality - Requesting devlopment team
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

Knowledge of Java language, based on a scale 1-10: 10 being most experienced - 8
Maturity level 1-10 - 10
Can you take constructive criticism? - yea
Estimation of how many hours daily you can work? - i have pt tuesdays and thursdays and i like to stay out all day on those days. i am not available anywhere from 9pm-5am
You will not drop out of the project unless you honestly think it’s going no where. ok
Skype: usmc.sikes

Read full topic

item.title: Artificial Reality - Requesting devlopment team
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]
Welcome, thanks for viewing my thread.
Before I explain i’d like to lay out a few things.[/center]

The base: Project Insanity

Requirements to join this development team!
Knowledge of Java
Maturity
Can take constructive criticism!

What AR is about;
I’ve always wanted to develop a server in which players will want to play. I’ve seen so many… dull servers, so many remakes, so many spawn servers. What I’m wanting to produce out of this project is a unique server that people will want to play. I’ve noticed the popularity of modern day RS type of servers. So this is no remake of a specific time in Runescape, nor is it supposed to be made ‘like’ Runescape. This server will need it’s on unique features, something players will enjoy, while having a good economy aswell. No one wants to play a server in which 99.9% of the players are rich. I’m looking for a team that’s willing to stick together! Not one that falls apart within 2 days, you must know what you’re doing! Feel free to ask questions if you’re stumped though. Just don’t come in and ask how to add commands.


Server features;
Summoning, with full BoB storage. Correct amount stored depending on familiar.
All skills trainable, although I would like to rewrite a few of them.
Great combat, it’s been tweaked a bit to fix accuracy.
Barrows Ofc
GWD Ofc
100% duel arena, what I mean by 100% as in no bugs, no dupes, no glitching that I’m aware of. I’ve spent some time trying to get rid of all the bugs in this mini-game. I’ve tested it with a few friends, seems to work fine.
Working Run/prayer/Hp orbs
Divine SS effect

Application format;

Knowledge of Java language, based on a scale 1-10: 10 being most experienced
Maturity level 1-10
Can you take constructive criticism?
Estimation of how many hours daily you can work?
You will not drop out of the project unless you honestly think it's going no where.
Msn:
Skype:

[color=blue][b]

Some pictures, more coming soon

14a9g7.jpg770×324

14dovpt.jpg766×492



Read full topic
